backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, role-based access control, seat initialization, and booking data structures with admin-managed roles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router and layout setup handling authentication state, profile initialization, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Admin table listing all active bookings with user names, seat info, and formatted date/time.
frontend/src/components/admin/LibraryHou: Admin panel for viewing and updating library opening and closing hours with select inputs.
frontend/src/components/admin/SeatConfig: Displays seat configuration stats with loading state and shows total, reserved, and general seats.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Lists user profiles, shows current roles, and allows admins to change user roles with a loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing status and clearing query cache on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that prompts new users to enter their name and saves a default General Student profile.
frontend/src/components/booking/ActiveBo: Shows details of the user’s active booking and provides a confirmation dialog to cancel it.
frontend/src/components/booking/DateAndS: Lets users pick a date and time slot based on schedule hours, displaying available 2‑hour slots.
frontend/src/components/booking/SeatGrid: Renders seat availability, allows selecting a seat, and submits a booking for the chosen time slot.
frontend/src/components/booking/SeatLege: Explains seat status icons and indicates reserved seat rules based on user role.
frontend/src/components/common/AccessDen: Displays an access‑denied message with a button linking back to the dashboard.
Provides the main layout with navigation, user greeting, and footer, showing admin links when applicable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerContext.ts: Fetches caller-specific data such as user profile, admin status, and library role using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context for authentication, identity loading, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles, roles, library hours, seats, and bookings.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a warm palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for user management, bookings, and configuration, restricted to admins.
Landing page for signed‑out users showing library info, booking features, and a login button with a hero image.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard that loads profile, schedule, and bookings, enabling slot selection and seat booking with tabs for booking and info.
frontend/src/utils/timeSlots.ts: Utility functions for generating 2‑hour time slots, formatting dates and times, and converting between dates and nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the system’s features, requirements, and current implementation state.
